A6020.changelog:
- Blacklisted google hotword service to fix mic issues
- Enabled audiosphere effect by default
- Fixed FM radio
- Fixed postprocessing daemon crashes
- Misc changes for infra

davinci.changelog:
07/01/2021
-Improved performance and UX by switching to the Pixel Power HAL (libperfmgr)
-Updated blobs from MIUI 20.12.28
05/01/2021
-Upstreamed the kernel to Linux 4.14.213
30/12/2020
-Improved FOD behaviour
-Switched to AOSP Bluetooth
-Updated blobs from MIUI 20.12.26
27/12/2020
-Fixed Styles and Wallpapers crash while using a Live Wallpaper

Notes:
- Recommended required firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Use the Android 10 compatible recoveries, like official TWRP

ginkgo.changelog:
- Upstreamed kernel to v4.14.213
- Performance improvements

lavender.changelog:
- Fixed Deepsleep
- Redfin FP for January SPL
- Predator-Stormbreaker HMP inline

lmi.changelog:
- trying new tree made by TH779, DT2W fixed

- enable FOD, was disabled in last build

- firmware require MIUI V12.0.8.0.QJKCNXM

- clean flash recommended

miatoll.changelog:
• Upstreamed kernel to 4.4.212
• Fixed rare green artifacts while playing videos

mido.changelog:
Note:
- These are still going to continue on 3.18 builds only.
- Requests for 4.9 builds will be ignored.

This decision has been taken as per the equal no.of requests from both sides of the parties and concluded by the outcome of adverse performance affects.

phoenix.changelog:

raphael.changelog:

Note:

sanders.changelog:
Clean flash must (kindly backup your data before flashing)
improved  performance
Enabled ZRAM by default
Tuned ZRAM for better performance
Compiled with hwui for better performance
Switched to Mad Kernel 2.0

surya.changelog:
- Fixed camera video recording issues.
- Address a wfd denial
- Fixed OTA auto flashing sepolicy denial
- Add keylayouts for headphone jack volume control
- Fixed notification led
- Fixed HDR
- Fixed offline charging
- Fixed recorder issue
- Upstream power profile
- Fixed inconsistencies in Wi-Fi range
- Addressed few more Wi-Fi related issues
- Fixed a possible Gcam crash
- Add a few missing FM blobs
- Fixed FM radio
- Misc fixes and changes

Note:
- Unified builds
- Google voice match should be working now while screen on.

violet.changelog:
